tasks.title: Prewarm the skyline runner lane
tasks.description: Trim cold-starts by teaching Echo Computer to spin up a warm pool for back-to-back Python/Node chains.
steps: Log every runner phase (queue, start, teardown) for a dual-language request and capture the gaps.
Enable prewarming for the second language and rerun until the delta drops below 5s end-to-end.
Save the before/after timings plus config toggles to `workspaces/demo/logs/runner-skyline.json`.

tasks.title: Paint the celestial overlay palette
tasks.description: Draft a narrative overlay that surfaces palette, soundtrack, and intent without hiding the terminal.
steps: Author `overlays/celestial.json` with gradient stops, soundtrack links, and on-success/failure copy.
Prototype the overlay in HTML/CSS or ASCII art inside the workspace to feel the motion cues.
Annotate how the overlay should react to latency spikes or test failures inside the mock file.

tasks.title: Ship the ground-station handoff kit
tasks.description: Bundle commands, logs, and reviewer radar notes so another operator can resume the upgrade instantly.
steps: List the critical files touched today plus `npm`/`python` commands to replay the run.
Highlight at least two ideal reviewers with reasons (recent commits, subsystem familiarity, etc.).
Publish the kit to `/handoff/kits/ground-station.json` and drop a link in the Echo feed.

tasks.title: Trace the cloud signal lane
tasks.description: Validate Echo Computer's cloud endpoints and record latency/error budgets before the next rollout.
steps: Ping each public endpoint and write latency + status into `cloud/healthcheck.json`.
Tail the worker pods for 2â€“3 minutes to confirm no silent retries or throttling.
Summarize regressions in the ops journal with links to the collected metrics.

tasks.title: Check the cache drift lane
tasks.description: Benchmark cached vs. cold runs for the same project and document how to trigger safe invalidation.
steps: Run a representative build twice and capture timing + cache hit/miss signals.
Toggle a dependency version to confirm the cache invalidates and restores cleanly.
Record the commands and deltas inside `workspaces/demo/logs/cache-drift.json`.

tasks.title: Co-author today's ops journal
tasks.description: Pair with another operator to summarize risks, next steps, and key telemetry snippets from this session.
steps: Capture two telemetry snippets (logs or metrics) with short captions and timestamps.
Draft a mini handoff note with blockers, ready commands, and the reviewer you want feedback from first.
Publish the journal entry to the shared feed or `/handoff/journal` endpoint for archival.
